Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: sighting detailsdate: 7-29-2012 time: 9:55 pm - 10 pm location: portland, oregon zip code 97202 just arrived at cleveland high school track & field myself & 2 other witnesses. vantage: just n. of bleachers at field. observation: lights\orbs\fireballs direction s.e towards powell blvd estimate 2~ miles distance, they were mostly white slightly yellow, total of 10 to 12 light orbs moving slowly, & chaotically in all directions; all moving independent of each-other; some appeared stationary. they eventually faded out then in, and finally, gradually all faded out. the observed sighting was 5 minutes in length. by 10:00 pm they were gone. no way in hell were any of these airplanes! after the first minute they were forming a rough circle, which about 20 seconds later then resembled more of a pentagon, and there appeared to be only 5, or 6 of them in this pentagon formation. direction of lights: s.e. estimated height: 2,000 - 3,000 ft there was a tall coniferous tree approx. 1 street south of powell -- from my vantage point at the field. the orbs were directly above tree, by about 1\3 of the tree's height.
Summary: TEN WHITE/YELLOW FIRE BALL ORBS HOVERING OVER S.E. PORTLAND
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
